channel.title: 16 slot's SMP server and classic servers!
channel.description:
We have a 16 slot Smp server with no-lag and we also have 2 minecraft classic server's One called Lgmax Dreamworld and the other Lgmax Lava survival that both have 32 slots for any ranked players.
There is currently more upcoming server's and more not including minecraft.
Our website is www.lgmax.net and our Smp server is smp.lgmax.net.
Sign up and put this link In the referral area:http://lgmax.net/member.php?action=register&referrer=174
Join now and have some fun!
